title: Note Application
desc: A note application employing PrimeNG for UI components and an HTTP client for API interactions, implementing CRUD functionality.

title: Location App
desc: A location-swapping app with ES6, Bootstrap for responsive design, enabling users to interchange positions and search locations seamlessly.

title: Profile
desc: A Single Page Application showcasing experience and skillsets, built with Angular, PrimeNG for UI, and HTTP client for seamless data interaction.
